forum.content:
Do you dare to be yourself?

I used to sacrifice myself to be nice to others and didn't dare to be who I really am.

But now I love myself and dare to be myself which makes me happy.

You can be youself as long as you don't harm others and then you would feel really happy like me. ^^
forum.title: 【Sharing】 Just be you, be extraordinary....... 《Heroes》
